==History==
==History==
â
[[Image:MSpowerpoint2000screenshot.png|thumb|300px|right|Microsoft PowerPoint 2000]]
 
The first version of PowerPoint was initially developed on 14 August 1984 by Robert Gaskins and Dennis Austin of Forethought, Inc. of Sunnyvale, California.<ref>{{cite journal|last=Gaskins|first=Robert|date=1984-08-14|title=Sample Product Proposal: presentation graphics for overhead projection|url=http://www.gbuwizards.com/files/gaskins-original-powerpoint-proposal-14-aug-1984.pdf|accessdate=2009-08-19}}</ref> Originally designed for the Macintosh computer, the initial release was called "Presentation". In 1987, it was renamed to "PowerPoint" due to problems with trademarks.<ref>{{cite web
